snippet: Coldplay's tribute to MCA - a piano-ballad version of "(You Gotta) Fight for Your Right (to Party!)" is baffling.
abstract: Coldplay's tribute to MCA - a piano-ballad version of "(You Gotta) Fight for Your Right (to Party!)" is baffling.

headline.main: Is Coldplay's Tribute to MCA Touching? Or Just Awful?
